content:
Check out: https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/pull/10617

As of that PR, rust-analyzer defines an MSRV for its crates!
I am building RA in a slightly weirder method than normal use gentoo's package manager rather than cargo
not sure what MSRV is but I can research that, but not getting a warning from xtask is probably why this failed without any other warning
I think I have all the info I need for now, thanks again for the quick response
John T has marked this topic as resolved.
